function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing measures in stores","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission among customers and employees","Mitigation":"Enforce strict social distancing measures and limit the number of customers in the store","Technologies":"Monitoring and alert systems for social distancing compliance","People":"Customers, employees","Owner":"Store management"},{"Description":"Unsanitary surfaces and lack of hand disinfecting points","Impact":"Increased risk of surface transmission of disease","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces and installation of hand disinfecting points","Technologies":"Automated cleaning systems, touchless hand sanitizers","People":"Customers, employees","Owner":"Store management"},{"Description":"Unregulated use of cash payments","Impact":"Potential for disease transmission through the exchange of cash","Mitigation":"Encourage contactless payment methods and strict hygiene practices for cash handling","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, UV sterilization for cash handling","People":"Customers, employees","Owner":"Store management"}]}
